name: @massive-apps/weather-station
description: Weather Station for FHEM home automation

scripts.init: git clone https://github.com/Menes1337/weather-station-app-api extensions/weather-station-api && git clone https://github.com/Menes1337/weather-station-app-theme themes/weather-station && npm run init:npm
scripts.init:npm: cd extensions/weather-station-api/extension && npm i && cd ../../.. && cd themes/weather-station&& npm i && cd ../../..
